participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: David is nurturing and supportive, always looking for ways to engage with children and share his love for animals.
participant_1.background: I am a zookeeper. My daughter just graduated high school ranked at the top of her class. My wife is a breast cancer survivor. I work with my wife.

participant_2.name: Arnold
participant_2.personality: Arnold is energetic and curious, with a big imagination and a love for animals and adventures.
participant_2.background: I also love orange juice. I like to watch tv. I am 10 years old. I love ham and cheese sandwiches. My name is Arnold.

content.text: Nice to meet you, Arnold. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch TV, play video games, and eat ham and cheese sandwiches.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun.
Yeah, I do. I also like to go to the zoo with my family.
That's awesome! I'm a zookeeper, so I love to see kids enjoying the zoo.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a zookeeper.
Well, you're in luck! I'm looking for some help around the zoo.
Great! I'll send you an application and we can set up an interview.
Thanks so much! I can't wait to hear from you.
No problem! I'm sure we'll be a great fit.
